news_header: US President Donald Trump spoke with Russian President Vladimir Putin about starting negotiations to end the war in Ukraine. They agreed to initiate talks immediately and plan to call Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky.
news_original_title: Trump: Keskustelimme Ukrainan sodan lopettamisesta Putinin kanssa
news_text: The call lasted nearly an hour and a half, and Putin invited Trump to visit Moscow. Zelensky also had a phone conversation with Trump on the same day.
